page.title: 10My Big Day-1985's Gala Queen
page.content: At school two months before the gala our Headmaster,Mr.Hewitt, drew lots to find the gala queen and her attendants.My number came out and so did those of attendants{Charlotte {Turner,Claire Hind, Sarah Noble,Paula {Fletcher and Sara Baxter.}I was so pleased when my number 5 came out and I couldn't wait to get home to tell my mum. The months flew by and soon it was {gala day.}Ifelt really important as I rode up Main St. with my attendants in a horse drawn trap.All the village seemed to be watching us.It was sunny and warm and I had a lovely day.I also enjoyed it the next day on Sunday when I had to attend as queen a special outdoor gala service in Beckside Field. {Joanna Oddy,aged 11.
